mapper.select: select n.id, n.name, tr.id, tr.gmt_create, t.status, tr.requirement from treatment tr, non_medicine n, transaction_log t where t.registration_id = #{caseId} and t.collection_id = tr.id and t.project_id = tr.project_id and n.id = tr.project_id and tr.status = 2 and tr.department_id = #{departmentId}
mapper.update: update treatment set status = 3 where id = #{collectionId} and project_id = #{projectId} and status = 2
